overview: A story of a stripper and a truth laid bare. She was dancing in a night club when the threats started. And in the erotic underworld of dark strip halls and questionable character- everyone was suspect. Meet Janine- dance circuit superstar and erotic actress- both in real life and in Blonde Justice. A sensational new Vivid discovery- who ignites the screen as she has the stage. This is her debut. Blonde Justice, starring Janine, the girl who took the law into her own hands. What you take into yours is up to you.
title: Blonde Justice
